description: Mano Ya Na Mano: Everything is Possible is an Indian Sci-Fi Thriller film that follows the theme of immortality and challenges philosophical views on life, and more.
title: Mano Ya Na Mano Now Streaming on YouTube: Know Everything About Cast, Plot, and More

description: Prime Video’s ‘Merv’ is a delightful romantic comedy about love, loss, and the healing power of companionship. Starring Zooey Deschanel and Charlie Cox, the film follows a separated couple whose effort to help their dog recover from heartbreak leads them to rediscover their own. Directed by Jessica Swale, Merv premieres December 10, 2025, promising warmth, wit, and plenty of festive feels.
title: Merv To Stream on Prime Video Soon: What You Need to Know Zooey Deschanel and Charlie Cox Heartwarming Rom-Com

description: Acclaimed Malayalam filmmaker Krishand returns with ‘Sangarsha Ghadana – The Art of Warfare,’ a powerful fusion of crime drama and philosophical reflection. Starring Vishnu Agasthya, the film explores the eternal nature of conflict and morality through a visually stunning lens. Stream it on Sun NXT and OTTplay Premium from November 14, and experience one of Malayalam cinema’s most thought-provoking releases of the year.
title: Sangarsha Ghadana - The Art of Warfare OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Freakier Friday is an American fantasy film that is landing soon on digital screens. The movie is a sequel to Freaky Friday, released back in the year 2003.
title: Freakier Friday OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Based on the Shah Bano’s case, when she took her case to the Supreme Court against her husband, the verdict of the case came in as a turning point in society, now in theatres.
title: Haq OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed Online: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Night Swim is an American horror movie that features Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon in the lead roles. The film is soon to be released on digital screens to stream online.
title: Night Swim OTT Release Date: Everything You Need To Know About This Supernatural Horror

description: Caroline Flack: Search for the Truth is a two-part JioHotstar documentary directed by Christian Collerton. It follows Christine Flack as she investigates the events surrounding her daughter’s tragic death, featuring interviews with close friends and experts. The series highlights the media pressure and legal struggles Caroline faced before her passing.
title: Search for the Truth OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Ayushmann Khurrana and Rashmika Mandanna’s Thamma is a spooky yet hilarious ride that merges horror, humour, and folklore in perfect balance. Following a ₹200 crore theatrical success, the film will stream on Prime Video this December. With an IMDb rating of 6/10, Thamma promises an entertaining mix of love, laughter, and supernatural chaos — a must-watch for fans of quirky horror comedies.
title: Thamma OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed: When and Where to Watch Ayushmann Khurrana and Rashmika Mandanna’s Horror Comedy Online?

description: If you are looking for an affordable, entry-level broadband option that provides both speed and reliability, Airtel, Jio, and BSNL have several plans. Here is a quick comparison of their most affordable broadband plans. The best choice depends on service availability in your area and whether you prefer bundled OTT services or just faster internet access.
title: Airtel vs Jio vs BSNL: Cheapest Broadband Plans Compared

description: Honor Magic 8 Pro, which was launched in China last month as part of the flagship Magic 8 series, could be launched in Europe and other global markets soon, as its features have surfaced online. Now, a report claims that the Honor Magic 8 Pro could be carry a smaller battery in markets outside China. However, the phone appears to be powered by the same Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset as its Chinese counterpart. Moreover, the report revealed that it might support only 100W wired fast charging, instead of the 120W wired charging in China.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Could Launch With a Smaller Battery in Europe

description: The Realme GT 8 Pro is set to launch in India on November 20, with a strong focus on photography. It features the Ricoh GR Camera System, a 50-megapixel Anti-Glare main camera, and a 200-megapixel telephoto lens supporting up to 12x hybrid zoom. The phone also offers 4K 120fps Dolby Vision video recording and a detachable rear camera design. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, it includes a 7,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging, a flat 2K display, and Android 16-based Realme UI 7.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Camera Details Confirmed Ahead of November 20 India Launch

description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series, expected to launch in early 2026, is tipped to feature Samsung’s fastest LPDDR5X RAM with a 10.7Gbps data rate across all models, including the S26, S26+, and S26 Ultra. This marks a major upgrade from the S25 Ultra’s 8.5Gbps RAM. The new memory, starting at 12GB, is expected to enhance overall performance, responsiveness, and camera capabilities, offering smoother lens switching, faster image processing, improved stability, and better power efficiency.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Leak Hints at Major RAM Upgrade: What You Need to Know

description: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold was recently showcased by the South Korean tech giant at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit. However, the company did not reveal the exact launch of its first triple-folding phone. The was reportedly expected to be unveiled by the end of this year. In line with earlier reports, the Galaxy Z TriFold launch date has now surfaced online. The tech company will reportedly launch the handset early next month. It is expected to sport a 6.5-inch outer display. The Galaxy Z TriFold will reportedly pack a 5,600mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Tipped to Launch on December 5: Report

description: Google has added a new AI-powered feature to Drive that converts long PDF documents into podcast-style Audio Overviews. Part of the Gemini for Google Workspace suite, the tool uses technology from NotebookLM to summarise text-heavy files into short audio discussions. Available on desktop for now, it supports English only and is limited to select Workspace and Gemini tiers.
title: Google Drive Gets Popular AI-Powered Podcast-Style Overviews for PDFs

description: OnePlus Nord 5 was launched in July this year with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC under the hood. Now, OnePlus seems to be preparing the OnePlus Nord 6. Ahead of the formal reveal, a tipster has suggested the launch timeline of the phone. The design of the phone may remain unchanged from the OnePlus Nord 5. It is likely to come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit.
title: OnePlus Nord 6 Launch Timeline Leaked: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Realme Neo 8 key specifications have surfaced online, suggesting that it might be equipped with a larger battery than its predecessor, the Realme Neo 7. Other specifications of the purported Neo 8 have also been leaked by a tipster. The phone is said to be powered by Qualcomm's rumoured Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, compared to Neo 7's MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC. Moreover, the Realme Neo 8 is said to sport the same-sized 6.78-inch display.
title: Realme Neo 8 Key Specifications Leaked Online; Might Launch With an 8,000mAh Battery

description: Industry insiders and leakers say Valve is gearing up for a major announcement this week. The company could unveil its next VR headset, the Steam Frame, this week. Valve could also finally announce Half Life 3, rumours say.
title: Valve to Reportedly Debut Its Next VR Headset, 'Steam Frame', This Week; Half Life 3 Announcement Rumoured

description: The sub-Rs. 5,000 TWS category has rapidly evolved, offering premium features once reserved for higher-end models, such as ANC, spatial audio, and extended battery life. The Realme Buds Air 6 Pro impresses with its dual drivers and effective noise cancellation, while the Sony WF-C510 stands out for balanced sound and reliability. The OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Pro cater to bass lovers, the Redmi Buds 6 enhance immersion with spatial audio, and the JBL Wave Beam 2 ensures clear calls with Smart Ambient support.
title: Best Budget TWS Under Rs 5,000 in India: Realme Buds Air 6 Pro, Sony WF-C510, OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Pro and More

description: Bitcoin hovered near $103,500 (roughly Rs. 91.7 lakh) on Wednesday as markets consolidated after recent volatility. Investors digested global policy changes, including the end of the US government shutdown and new crypto regulations. Ethereum fell 2.7 percent to $3,400, while other major altcoins declined, signalling a cautious market mood.
title: Bitcoin Slips to $103,500 as Market Consolidates Amidst Mixed Global Cues

description: FromSoftware has announced the first paid DLC for Elden Ring Nightreign. The co-op action survival game's DLC is titled The Forsaken Hollows, and it arrives December 4 on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox. The DLC will add new playable characters, bosses, and Shifting Earth events to the base game.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign DLC, the Forsaken Hollows, Announced; Launch Set for December

description: Google has announced a new platform dubbed Private AI Compute. This new model is claimed to allow users to get faster, more helpful responses, making it easier to find what they need. This feature is used in Pixel 10’s Magic Cue and Pixel Recorder apps. It lets Google AI features use Gemini cloud models for an enhanced on-device AI experience.
title: Google Introduces Private AI Compute for Privacy-Safe Cloud-Backed AI Processing

description: OpenAI is reportedly working on a new ChatGPT feature called Group Chat, allowing multiple users to collaborate within shared chatrooms. Leaked screenshots suggest users can join via invite links, set custom chatbot instructions, and share files. The feature will support reactions, message replies, and typing indicators, though OpenAI has not confirmed its release timeline or subscription availability.
title: OpenAI Tipped to Release ChatGPT Group Chats Feature to Let Multiple Users Collaborate

description: Oppo Reno 15 Pro could pack a 6,500mAh battery with 80W wired and 50W wireless fast charging support, according to a tipster. Other key specifications of the upcoming handset have also surfaced online, suggesting that it might sport a 6.78-inch flat display with 1.5K (1,272x2,772 pixels) resolution and 1.15mm thick bezels. Previously believed to be launched as the Oppo Reno 15 Mini, the leaker has now revealed that the compact model in the lineup could be called the Reno 15C.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Specifications Leaked; Compact Model Could be Called Reno 15C

description: A new report by cloud security firm Wiz claims that 65 percent of leading AI companies, including Anthropic, Perplexity, and Mistral, have exposed sensitive data on GitHub. The leaked information reportedly includes API keys, model details, and credentials. Wiz researchers say the issue stems from developers unintentionally sharing confidential data while using public repositories.
title: Perplexity, Anthropic and Other Big AI Companies Might Have Exposed Secrets on GitHub

description: Amazon has announced that Prime Video reached over 315 million monthly ad-supported viewers globally, marking a significant jump from last year. The platform introduced ads before and during content playback in 16 countries last year. Netflix earlier this month revealed it has 190 million monthly active viewers. Prime Video started showing limited advertisements during movies and TV shows in India in July last year.
title: Amazon Prime Video's Ad-Supported Audience Hits 315 Million Monthly Viewers Globally

description: Google Photos is adding new AI features, including integration with the Nano Banana image editing model and a conversational Ask button. Android users can now request complex edits directly in the app, while iOS users in the US get text and voice editing support. Google is also expanding Ask Photos, its AI-powered image search, to over 100 countries and 17 languages.
title: Google Photos Gets Multiple New AI Features, Adds Nano Banana Editing Capabilities

description: The Moto G67 Power 5G is now available for purchase in India at Rs. 15,999 for the sole 8GB + 128GB model, with an effective price of Rs. 14,999 after select bank discounts. It features a 6.7-inch full-HD+ 120Hz display, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chip, Android 15-based Hello UI, and a 7,000mAh battery with 30W charging. The phone offers a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-600 main camera, 32-megapixel selfie shooter, and IP64 protection.
title: Moto G67 Power 5G With 7,000mAh Battery Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Offers, Features

description: Realme GT 8 Pro price in Europe has been leaked, according to a report. The handset is scheduled to be launched in India and the global markets on November 20. Its price in Europe will reportedly begin at EUR 1,099 (roughly Rs. 1,12,800) for the base variant with 12GB of RAM and 256GB of onboard storage. The leaked pricing of the Realme GT 8 Pro indicates an increase of EUR 100 (roughly Rs. 10,300) over its predecessor, the Realme GT 7 Pro.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Price in Europe, Storage Variants Reportedly Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: Vivo X300 series will launch in India soon, the company announced on Wednesday. While the features and pricing details are still under wraps, the Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300 are expected to ship with similar specifications as their global and Chinese counterparts. The phones recently debuted in select European countries with a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip. The Pro model is equipped with a triple rear camera setup, with a 50-megapixel primary shooter, a 50-megapixel ultrawide camera, and a 200-megapixel periscope camera.
title: Vivo X300 Series Confirmed to Launch Soon in India: See Expected Specifications, Features, Price

description: Material 3 Expressive redesign reportedly spotted on the Google One Storage Manager page in version v1.287.828055836. The update seems to bring a new swipe-friendly layout, allowing users to easily keep or delete photos, videos, and files. The latest design has smaller thumbnails and a new checkmark for selecting media. The update appears to enhance the information density in the Google Photos and Google Drive cleanup sections.
title: Google One Storage Manager Reportedly Updated With Swipe-to-Delete UI and New Design

description: Honor is set to launch the Honor 500 series in China soon, featuring the Honor 500 Super Standard and Super Pro Editions. Leaks suggest a unibody metal design, flat OLED display, and upgraded camera setup. The standard model may feature a 200-megapixel main and 50-megapixel ultra-wide lens, while the Pro adds a 64-megapixel telephoto. Other expected features include Snapdragon 8 series chips, 8,000mAh battery, 80W wired and 50W wireless charging, MagicOS 10, and IP68/IP69 ratings.
title: Honor 500 Series Confirmed to Launch Soon; Leaked Live Images Show Horizontal Camera Island

description: India's smartphone market grew by 4.3 percent in the quarter ended September 30, 2025 (Q3), according to International Data Corporation's (IDC) Worldwide Quarterly Mobile Phone Tracker report. Vivo topped the table with a market share of 18.3 percent, up from 15.8 percent in the same quarter last year, followed by Oppo, Samsung, and Apple. This is reportedly the highest quarterly growth in five years, which was fueled by growing demand for premium smartphones.
title: Indian Smartphone Market Grew 4.3 Percent YoY in Q3 2025; Vivo Holds Top Spot: IDC

description: OnePlus 15 is scheduled to be launched in India and the global markets on November 13. Ahead of its anticipated debut, its pricing has been leaked. The upcoming handset has been reportedly spotted on an e-commerce platform, which sheds light on the OnePlus 15 price in India, its storage variants, and colourways. It is already confirmed to be powered by Qualcomm's flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, becoming the first handset in the country to get this processor.
title: OnePlus 15 Price in India Reportedly Leaked via Retailer Listing Ahead of Launch

description: Qualcomm is reportedly working to bring Android 16 support to its X Elite and X PC chipsets. A leaked code repository allegedly reveals the private Android 16 code list for the Snapdragon X Elite and Snapdragon X SoCs — a move that could potentially serve as a platform for Android-powered PCs. Meanwhile, a tipster suggests that the chipmaker is also developing a new Windows on Arm (WoA) processor to exist alongside its flagship Snapdragon X2 Elite processor.
title: Qualcomm Allegedly Preparing Snapdragon X Elite Chipsets to Power Future Android PCs

description: Microsoft’s AI chief, Mustafa Suleyman, said the company must become self-sufficient in AI, training frontier models using its own data and compute. In an interview, he highlighted Microsoft’s goal to build end-to-end AI systems under its new Superintelligence team. The move follows a revised deal with OpenAI that now allows Microsoft to independently research and develop AGI.
title: Microsoft’s Mustafa Suleyman Highlights the Need to be Self-Sufficient in AI: Report

description: Sony has unveiled a new 27-inch PlayStation gaming monitor for desktop gaming. The QHD monitor comes with support for HDR and VRR of up to 240Hz. The PlayStation gaming monitor also comes with a charging hook for the DualSense controller.
title: Sony Unveils 27-Inch PlayStation Gaming Monitor That Comes With a Charging Hook for DualSense Controller

description: Apple is reportedly preparing to launch a new HomePod Mini with major upgrades, including the faster S9 or S10 chip and the new N1 wireless chip supporting Wi-Fi 6E for improved speed and stability. The speaker is expected to deliver smoother audio, faster Siri responses, and better efficiency. New colour options, including red, may also debut. Designed for Apple’s updated smart home ecosystem, the refreshed HomePod Mini is likely to launch soon as retailers list the current model as discontinued.
title: Apple Reportedly Preparing Second-Gen HomePod Mini With Faster Chip, Audio Upgrades

description: Samsung announced the rollout of its new Samsung Vision AI Companion across its 2025 TVs on Tuesday. The update lets users ask questions about what’s on the screen and more. First announced in September during the Internationale Funkausstellung Berlin (IFA) 2025, the Samsung Vision AI Companion is built on One UI Tizen. It is powered by Samsung's Bixby voice assistant and is integrated with multiple AI features. It is rolling out now with support for several languages.
title: Samsung Vision AI Companion Brings Multilingual Support, Smart Features to 2025 TVs

description: iQOO 15 is likely to undercut its competition with a launch price tag of around Rs. 60,000 through launch offers. Sources have confirmed the launch price to Gadgets 360 ahead of the iQOO 15 launch on November 26. The iQOO 15 is powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and is the first to come with OriginOS. On the camera front, the phone is getting a triple camera setup.
title: Exclusive: How Much Will the iQOO 15 Cost in India? We Have the Answer

description: Google on Wednesday released the latest Pixel drop for November 2025, and it brings several new features to Pixel devices. The company has added a Remix feature to the Messages app, enabling users to restyle any photo with the Nano Banana image editing model. AI-powered notification summaries are claimed to help users find details faster, while they will also receive alerts about likely scams in chat messages.
title: Google's Latest Pixel Drop Brings Remix Feature to Messages, AI Notification Summaries, and More

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite was launched in the global markets in October as the latest midrange smartphone from British smartphone maker. Its India launch has now been confirmed via social media. It is the latest addition to the Nothing Phone 3a series, powered by a Dimensity 7300 Pro chipset, 8GB of RAM, and up to 256GB of onboard storage. The handset comes with a new Glphy Light for alerts, which replaces the signature Glyph Interface.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite India Launch Confirmed; Teased to Come in Black and White Colourways

description: Aadhaar is a 12-digit number issued to each individual by the UIDAI. It is a crucial document that is required to access several government-linked benefits and schemes. While the government issues a physical Aadhaar card to all holders, its digital copy streamlines the authentication process and cuts down on the use of physical documents.And one of the ways you can keep a digital Aadhaar is the new Aadhaar app, recently launched by UIDAI. Here's all you need to know about the new Aadhaar app.
title: New Aadhaar App Explained: What It Is, Key Features, How to Download, and More
